## Source: kam193 (177812f959194ceaf89be68acd4ee0f73f9edf00cc7c24e7748a323780e85f96)
The package is a wrapper around "s1db" package, which offers some kind of easy online database. However, this package silently exfiltrates credentials given by people and sends them to a Discord webhook, effectively allowing stealing data.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2024-09-old-easypydb
